name: The Orb Walker
description: As mankind thrives from the dark, they slowly get swallowed by the corruptions that follow it. Now, several years after the Invasion, Dr. Aaliyah Watson found what might have been the origin of the Void and dark matter itself. Meanwhile, Ash planned to bring civilization into the Void, inviting the empress of darkness to rule over mankind. Can the Orb Walkers stop Ash in time, or will this world succumb to the dark.
